test-set.name: xp-striding-crawling-consumingA
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Crawling, RS: Consuming A descendant(-or-self) axis on a child or descendant(-or-self) axis is crawling and consuming (scanning expression)

test-case.name: xp-striding-crawling-consumingA001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: crawling, RS: consuming Base expression: foo Separators: / With axes: descendant, descendant-or-self With node types: element, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
